    • 构造器详细资料

      • SaveLoadManager

        public SaveLoadManager​(boolean isSave)
        constructor of the save load manager
        参数:
        isSave - true to fetch the latest CameraManager.state_CamInfo_list, GObjectManager.gObjectList, and StateManager.getTotal_State_Number() to be ready to save data.

    • 方法详细资料

      • save

        public void save​(java.io.File selectedFile)
        serialize the data to local file
        参数:
        selectedFile - the output file information

      • load

        public void load​(java.io.File selectedFile)
        deserialize the local file to data, if success, clear all current data, and reload this data
        参数:
        selectedFile - the input file information
